summary: istg the hardest thing about this bnha fanfic writing thing is coming up with original hero names and quirks, i’ve spent like...
body: istg the hardest thing about this bnha fanfic writing thing is coming up with original hero names and quirks, i’ve spent like countless minutes just staring into nothing thinking about them, unable to start writing until i finally come up with something decent HAHAHAH

blog.name: austinonymous

blog.description: Male - 21 - He/Him A list of my fanfics can be found on the Fan-Fiction page, containing both my WIPs and One-Shots. The first post will always have links to tags I have a lot under. Send me a message, ask, or anything- I hope you enjoy my scribbles and random musings.

summary: Kaminari: I don’t see why people think Shinsou is scary? I mean look he has sweater paws. SWEATER PAWS! Sero: He flipped a man...
body:
• Kaminari: I don’t see why people think Shinsou is scary? I mean look he has sweater paws. SWEATER PAWS!
  • Sero: He flipped a man twice his size over his shoulder…
  • Kaminari: *glances at Shinsou* That’s adorable
  • Sero: *Stares at Kaminari*
  • Kaminari: Shinsou can flip me any day *wiggles eyebrows*
  • Sero: ಠ_ಠ

summary: Erasermic prompt for a Villain!Erasermic: Villain!Eraser meets Villain!Mic for the first time?
question: Erasermic prompt for a Villain!Erasermic: Villain!Eraser meets Villain!Mic for the first time?
answer:
I’m sooo sorry for the long wait omggg

Aizawa is more of an anti-hero than villain, but he becomes a full-fledged villain in this!

—

“I hate people like you.”

The blond before him is everything he detests: loud, gaudy, attention-seeking and arrogant. Even his stupid costume demands attention, with the compact amplifier of gold, leather suit studded with gems and those ridiculously bright red boots upon his legs.

Aizawa only keeps his harsh glare on the other as the villain approaches, clad only in his simple black sweater and sweatpants, trusty carbon-fibre scarf in hand. “So cold, Aizawa-kun! Come onnn, I haven’t even done anything to you yet!” The villain known as Present Mic saunters towards Aizawa, who narrows his eyes at hearing his name roll off those curled lips. “Stop following me,” he states firmly, eyes flashing red for merely a second in an act of intimidation, hopefully discouraging the blond from coming closer.

“Aww at least let me say what I want to,” Mic sniggers, kicking away a limp body that lies in the way with the toe of his polished boots, pausing only when Aizawa’s glare hardens, flashing a crimson red that suggests certain death if he comes any nearer.

The smile on his face infuriates Aizawa.

A quick snap of his wrist and a white fabric shoots across the mere feet between the villains, wrapping tight around the gloved hand that had been slowly making its way into his coat. “I suggest you talk now and move no closer, if you don’t want me to snap your bones right where you stand.” His voice practically seeps with danger and a promise of pain.

“We’re both villains, Eraser, what makes you think we are so different?” Mic smirks.

Aizawa blinks in mild confusion. “Eraser?”

The blond shrugs. “The people you express interest in tend to disappear shortly after,” Mic snaps his fingers with a dramatic flair. “As if you just erased away their existence.”

Aizawa can only scoff in amusement. “How lame,” he states dully. “I don’t need a codename like you flashy bastards who commit petty crimes for the sake of attention.”

Aizawa never really considered themselves a villain, but they never denied it either. It had seemed as though in this society once you do the unconventional you become a villain in the public’s eye, and if that’s what the world thinks of Aizawa, then so be it.

What’s the point of pretending like they want to be a hero when their ambitions lie in the same direction as the villains? All for what?

Fame and glory?

“Ahhh, I figured it’d be about that,” Mic grins, and with a quick swipe of his hand, a hidden blade slices cleanly through Aizawa’s scarf, essentially cutting him free. “You see,” he hums, ignoring Aizawa’s narrowed eyes as he takes on a defensive stance, “all that glamour, that is just all in good fun!”

He plops down on a crate heavily, making himself comfortable and patting the space next to him, an invitation for Aizawa to sit.

He doesn’t make a move.

“I love the limelight, knowing that people will know my name and anticipate what I do, I love when they realise I have a powerful quirk that they like to insist as a trait of a hero.” He smiles at the nostalgia of being a young kid, in awe and obsessed with the idea of being a celebrity, a hero.

And then the harsh reality of the society’s overbearing expectations weighed down on him, pushed him to near insanity with the insistent voices of the adults hounding him, asking him to be the best to be stronger than All Might-

“But I realised, why suffer so hard under the scrutiny of the world to become someone when you can become someone just by letting go?” Mic smiles, opening his hands out in an exagerrated wave. “You would know, wouldn’t you?” His gaze softens a little as he looks at Aizawa; that look makes Aizawa bristle in annoyance.

“You’d know how it feels to be nobody, nothing but the scrap of paper no one gives a second glance.”

Mic points at Aizawa with a gloved finger. “But I’m giving you a chance… No… I’m giving us a chance to change the world. Together.” He extends a hand out towards Aizawa. The other still seems skeptical… But Mic knows enough of the other man, knows more than enough to sway him to his side.

“Together we can rid the society of those fakers they call pro-heroes, of the true garbage that run free despite beating, shaming, torturing their children,” his grin becomes wider when Aizawa’s eyes widen in apparent shock. He’s hit the nail on the head. “I can help bring your story to light,” he whispers tenderly, “I can help you bring justice to your parents and protect your little brother.”

He’s cracking, Mic can tell. The topic of his family is enough to convince the man of his true purpose. “I heard there’s a court case brought up to regain custody of the boy.”

And that is enough to pull Aizawa to his side.

Begrudgingly, Aizawa reaches out with a pale hand, grabbing onto Mic’s and shaking it firmly, sealing their partnership. And hopefully, more than that. The blond grins.

“Welcome to the dark side, Aizawa-kun~”

blog.name: fourth-best-jeanist
blog.title: Fourth Best Jeanist
blog.description:
soo I’m gone on a trip out of wifi for two weeks (rip me) wish me luck friends o_o

Icon by @maplelemoncandy !

summary:
Deku: where do I get inspiration for my attacks? America!! It’s America!! United States of smash!! 
Uraraka: what is he doing?...
body:
Deku: where do I get inspiration for my attacks? America!! It’s America!! United States of smash!!

Uraraka: what is he doing?

Iida: he’s doing a “which pro hero are you” quiz. He’s taking it very seriously. If he doesn’t get allmight at the end then I think he might self destruct.

Deku: were you born with your power? No! It was given to me! Just like allmight! *clicks answer*

Deku: …

Deku: *cries*

Uraraka: are you ok? Who did you get?

Deku: *hands her his laptop*

Uraraka: you are…captain America?? Who is that?

Iida: oh you know - that American hero who was born small and weak and seemingly useless and was often bullied for his dreams of becoming something more, he continued to pursue his sense of justice, and once he gained the source of his power he became the symbol of peace during the war

Uraraka:

Iida:

Deku: *cries* I love him

(based on this post)

(based on this post)

trail.content_raw:
Deku: where do I get inspiration for my attacks? America!! It’s America!! United States of smash!!

Uraraka: what is he doing?

Iida: he’s doing a “which pro hero are you” quiz. He’s taking it very seriously. If he doesn’t get allmight at the end then I think he might self destruct.

Deku: were you born with your power? No! It was given to me! Just like allmight! *clicks answer*

Deku: …

Deku: *cries*

Uraraka: are you ok? Who did you get?

Deku: *hands her his laptop*

Uraraka: you are…captain America?? Who is that?

Iida: oh you know - that American hero who was born small and weak and seemingly useless and was often bullied for his dreams of becoming something more, he continued to pursue his sense of justice, and once he gained the source of his power he became the symbol of peace during the war

Uraraka:

Iida:

Deku: *cries* I love him

(based on this post)

summary:
Midoriya, walking in to Bakugou’s ketchup-filled room: Hey Kacchan, can I borrow your — aaAAAA
Tokoyami, under the bed in his...
body:
Midoriya, walking in to Bakugou’s ketchup-filled room: Hey Kacchan, can I borrow your — aaAAAA

Tokoyami, under the bed in his best “god is dead and you will be too” voice: Bakugou is gone forever

Midoriya: Oh my god give Kacchan back or I’m calling 911

Tokoyami: We took him to hell

Jirou: Where he belongs

Bakugou, outside the window: YOU BITCH only my mom can say that

summary:
Kirishima: I’m in pain.
Bakugou: I told you to take your pain medication.
Kirishima: [Grabs Bakugou’s hand and place it over his...
body:
Kirishima: I’m in pain.

Bakugou: I told you to take your pain medication.

Kirishima: [Grabs Bakugou’s hand and place it over his heart] It hurts right here… I think I like you.

Bakugou, blushing: Fuck you.

reblog.comment:

Bakugou: I told you to take your pain medication.

Kirishima: [Grabs Bakugou’s hand and place it over his heart] It hurts right here… I think I like you.

slug: fit-for-a-queen-crza-僕のヒーローアカデミア-boku-no
summary: Fit for a Queen - CrzA - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
title: Fit for a Queen - CrzA - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
“As you may or may not be aware… This wouldn’t be a western-style bachelor party without a little something.” Behind Denki, Kirishima snickers and Bakugou rolls his eyes. Shouto’s stomach drops slightly. “That something, my good friend, is obviously strippers. Well, stripper, in this case.”

“Denki—” Shouto starts, already feeling beyond uncomfortable by the notion alone.

“Oh, don’t worry, my Queen! I thought of everything to make this enjoyable for you. I went ahead and hired your favourite hero.” He winks.

Collab fic with @dominaecaede, her beautiful art made this fic so much more enjoyable to write!! 

Lemon flavoured so careful what you click for ;)
